description: Kodak 1699511 7.1 Megapixel Easyshare Z712 Is Zoom Digital Camera 7.1 Megapixels ; 12x Optical Zoom; 2.5" Indoor/Outdoor Color Display; 32 Mb Internal Memory & Secure Digital Card/Multimediacard Expansion Slot; Features Hi-Iso Scene Mode & Cropping ; Perfect Touch Technology; Kodak Color Science; Video Print Options Including 4, 9 Or 16 Up Prints; Features Optical Image Stabilization & Quick Click-To-Capture Speed (0.26 Sec) ; 16 Scene & 5 Color Modes; Features Tv-Quality Video At 30 Fps ; Includes Digital Camera, Li-Ion Digital Camera Battery, Usb & A/V Cables, Neck Strap, Kodak Easyshare Software & Custom Camera Insert
title: Kodak Easyshare Z712 IS 7.1 MP Digital Camera with 12xOptical Image Stabilized Zoom
